content:

DIR_STATE:["src/intake/normalize_task.py", "src/intake/validate_task.py", "src/intake/validation_checklist.py"]
SUMMARY: Added a standalone validate_task entrypoint and CLI that normalizes intake JSON (including DOI-missing defaults) and emits clear blocking validation errors.
